Let me make one thing perfectly clear: I think Krudo is crazy.

But he's not stupid. When he says he can turn imp horns into gold, I'm pretty sure that's crazy talk, but I'm not totally sure.

So humor the crazy coot. Get horns from the {@LinkCreature:8#1031#Caprin imps}, give them to Krudo, and see what happens. Go south from Castanica, then head to the western cavern.

Imp horns! Imp horns! Hooray! I can turn them into...solid gold! You want gold, right?

In just forty years...solid gold!

You're in a hurry? Kids today...(sigh). Take this for your trouble, then. And check back in forty years!
Can I help you? Or is it the other way around?
